title: Crime Alert 09.16.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.16.20
description:
Contractor installs mirrors inside girls' bathroom, inside the stalls so he can spy on the girls. Customer crawls through the drive-thru window because she doesn't get a cookie.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
